oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Correspondence from Donald A. Ramsay (General in the Confederate High Command) to Steve Lawrence (Williamson [County] Civil War Centennial Committee)

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Historical reenactments; War
Franklin, Battle of Franklin, Tenn., 1864; Tennessee - Civil War Centennial Commission; United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two-page correspondence from Donald A. Ramsay (General in the Confederate High Command) to Steve Lawrence (Williamson [County] Civil War Centennial Committee), on The Confederate High Command stationery, describing the plans for the Battle of Franklin re-enactment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ramsey, Donald A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Civil War Centennial Commission was charged with planning, organizing, and documenting the U. S. Civil War Centennial through a campaign of public awareness, education, preservation, and restoration.
